title: Specialty Epoxy Hardeners — Top & Floor Coat

items.name: Ark 172
items.description: Benzyl alcohol‑free solution for low odor and improved properties.

items.name: Ark 1216
items.description: Delivers superior gloss and vibrant color.

items.name: Ark 1217
items.description: Similar to Ark 1216 with a more convenient mixing ratio.

items.name: Ark 1237
items.description: Outstanding chemical resistance and performance under challenging conditions.

items.name: Ark 1263
items.description: High gloss and enhanced coating performance.

items.name: Ark 1265
items.description: Low‑temperature curing with strong adhesion on wet substrates.

items.name: Ark 1269
items.description: Similar to Ark 1265 but with a darker color.

items.name: Ark 1273
items.description: Faster curing compared to Ark 172 for quicker turnaround.

items.name: Ark 1241
items.description: Fast curing hardener for rapid processing.

items.name: Ark 1243
items.description: Outstanding chemical resistance for demanding applications.

items.name: Ark 1245
items.description: Designed for putty applications.

items.name: Ark 1256
items.description: Rapid curing for putty applications to boost productivity.

items.name: Ark 1258
items.description: Low‑viscosity grade for easy application and uniformity.

items.name: Ark 185
items.description: Fast curing with strong adhesion and durability for long service life.

items.name: Ark 132
items.description: Excellent chemical resistance and water impermeability for extended service life.

items.name: Accelerator Ark 131
items.description: Food‑grade, light‑color accelerator enhancing impermeability and service life.

items.name: Ark 129
items.description: Faster curing than Ark 122; low‑temperature curable with excellent adhesion.

items.name: Ark 122
items.description: Longer pot life than Ark 129; low‑temperature cure and strong substrate wetting.

items.name: Ark 1277
items.description: Faster drying with long‑term protection, weather resistance, and long shelf life.

items.name: Ark 1278
items.description: Fast drying, long‑term protection, weather resistance; dilutable hardener with extended shelf life.

items.name: OCTA®FINE
items.description: Specialized pigment preparations for water‑based decorative paints and emulsions.

items.name: ICHOLACE®
items.description: Specialty organic pigments for paints and coatings.

items.name: OCTATINT
items.description: Universal machine colorants for POS tinting of architectural paints.

items.name: Iron Oxide Red 130
items.description: For construction coatings, ceramics, and colored concretes.

items.name: Iron Oxide Yellow 920
items.description: Yellow iron oxide (FeOOH) with excellent UV stability.

items.name: Iron Oxide Black 318
items.description: Suitable for coatings, plastics, and magnetic applications.

items.name: Stapa® 4 L
items.description: Specialty aluminium pigment.

items.name: Stapa® 4 NL
items.description: Specialty aluminium pigment for dispersion in paints/plastics.

items.name: Omnivadd EP 4029
items.description: VOC‑ and solvent‑free, high MW additive for wetting and dispersing.

items.name: Omnivadd SP 4009
items.description: General‑use dispersant for cost‑effective performance in industrial coatings.

items.name: Omnivadd XP 4010
items.description: Versatile additive for industrial applications such as coil coatings and more.

items.name: Omnivadd SP 5001
items.description: Fatty acid‑based, cost‑effective dispersant ideal for primers and undercoats.

items.name: Omnivadd SP 5044
items.description: For solvent‑borne/solvent‑free systems; also in composites, SMC/BMC, and bentonite gels.

items.name: Omnivadd SP 5244
items.description: Solvent‑free alternative to Omnivadd SP 5044.

items.name: Omnivadd WP 6140
items.description: Aqueous solution of an ammonium salt of an acrylic polymer.

items.name: Omnivadd WP 6141
items.description: Particularly effective for dispersing inorganic pigments.

items.name: PureVadd 6220
items.description: Hybrid dispersant improving compatibility and color acceptance of universal colorants in base paints; ~55% bio‑based (ASTM D6866‑21).

items.name: PureVadd 6225
items.description: Hybrid dispersant for tinting systems with ~29% bio‑based content (ASTM D6866‑21).

items.name: Omnivadd WD 3052
items.description: Improves performance at any stage of production.

items.name: Omnivadd SF 3058
items.description: Anti‑cratering and leveling additive improving shine, long‑wave effect, recoatability, and interlayer adhesion at any stage.

items.name: Omnivadd XF 3257
items.description: Excellent slip, gloss boost, pigment treatment, and leveling prior to processing.

items.name: Omnivadd XF 3261
items.description: Enhances coating leveling and performance at any stage.

items.name: Omnivadd WF 3575
items.description: Substrate wetting, leveling, and anti‑cratering before/after processing.

items.name: Omnivadd XF 3772
items.description: Ideal for solvent‑borne/solvent‑free systems, coil/OEM/industrial coatings applied at the end of the process.

items.name: Omnivadd XF 3030
items.description: Enhances slip and mar resistance with excellent compatibility at any stage.

items.name: Omnivadd XT 3031
items.description: Optimal substrate wetting on critical surfaces; heat resistance and improved slip/mar resistance at any stage.

items.name: Omnivadd XF 3033
items.description: Clear‑coat wetting and anti‑cratering with excellent compatibility at any stage.

items.name: Omnivadd EF 3077
items.description: Exceptional wetting and leveling when added at the end of the process.

items.name: Omnivadd XF 3230
items.description: 100% version of Omnivadd XF 3030 for use at any stage.

items.name: Omnivadd WD 2020
items.description: For acid‑cure and NC‑curtain systems, unsaturated polyester and gelcoats; use pre/post processing.

items.name: Omnivadd ED 2163
items.description: Air‑release additive to eliminate foam/bubbles during production and application; use before/after processing.

items.name: Omnivadd WD 2504
items.description: High‑performance mineral‑oil defoamer for aqueous formulations; use before/after processing.

items.name: Omnivadd WD 2548
items.description: Silicone‑free, high‑performance defoamer for water‑based inks/coatings; use before/after processing.

items.name: Omnivadd WD 2025
items.description: Silicone‑based foam control additive for solvent‑based coatings; prevents foam/bubbles during application.

items.name: Omnivadd WD 2041
items.description: For solvent‑borne systems; effective across production stages.

items.name: Omnivadd WD 2722
items.description: Silicone‑based anti‑foam/de‑aeration for solvent‑free coatings & composites; rapid de‑aeration of solvent‑free epoxy/PU compounds for blister‑free self‑levelling coatings.

items.name: Hirenol PL1000S
items.description: Low‑volatile extender for epoxy, polyurethane, and related systems.

items.name: Detda 80
items.description: Liquid aromatic chain extender delivering high performance polyurethane and polyurea coatings.

items.name: Ark Reactive Epoxy Diluent
items.description: Reactive diluent with epoxy functionality that chemically integrates into the epoxy system.

items.name: CHISORB 292
items.description: Hindered amine light stabilizer providing UV protection with low volatility.

items.name: CHISORB 5530
items.description: High‑performance liquid UV absorber with excellent thermal stability for automotive and industrial coatings.

items.name: CHINOX 1010
items.description: Widely used antioxidant for polymers, elastomers, and adhesives; cost‑effective.

items.name: CHINOX 168
items.description: Phosphite antioxidant with excellent hydrolysis resistance for plastics, polyesters, elastomers, adhesives.

items.name: CHINOX 1076
items.description: Hindered phenolic antioxidant for plastics, polyurethane, elastomers, adhesives.

items.name: Primadur A400
items.description: Tri‑functional crosslinker that boosts adhesion in construction adhesives/sealants and industrial coatings.

items.name: C9 Hydrocarbon Resin
items.description: Granular light‑yellow solid from C9 catalytic polymerization; good heat resistance and chemical stability.
